basicInfo.name: Karin
basicInfo.flavor: Karin traveled to heal those who needed her helping hand. People began to praise her good acts, calling her Saint Karin.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Heal
Skill 1.desc:
Single Ally
 - Heals HP equal to 200% of the caster's Magic Attack.
 - Grants 2 Debuff Removal(s).
 - Grants 3 Debuff Removal(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Healing: HP Recovery amount becomes 230% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Effect: Debuff Removal count becomes 3.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Reduces Cooldown: To 61s.

Skill 2.name: Revive
Skill 2.desc:
Single Ally
 - Revives fallen target(s) with 50% HP.
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: HP gained upon revival becomes 70%.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Changes Number of Targets: To 2 Allies

Passive.name: Blessed Resurrection
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Revives with 65% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: HP gained upon revival becomes 80%.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.story: Karin traveled to heal those who needed her helping hand. People began to praise her good acts, calling her Saint Karin.

basicInfo.name: Karin
basicInfo.flavor: Karin teaches healing magic to the young healers of Terra Kingdom, earning her the title of Archmage among the people.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Heal
Skill 1.desc:
Single Ally
 - Heals HP equal to 180% of the caster's Magic Attack.
スキル強化効果
 - Grants 2 Debuff Removal(s).

Skill 2.name: Revive
Skill 2.desc:
Single Ally
 - Revives fallen target(s) with 35% HP.

Passive.name: Blessed Resurrection
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Revives with 50% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]

basicInfo.name: Karin
basicInfo.flavor: Karin is a girl who travels with Evan. When goblins attacked her family, she made it out alive thanks to Evan, but the rest of her family did not.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Heal
Skill 1.desc:
Single Ally
 - Heals HP equal to 160% of the caster's Magic Attack.
スキル強化効果
 - Grants 1 Debuff Removal(s).

Skill 2.name: Revive
Skill 2.desc:
Single Ally
 - Revives fallen target(s) with 20% HP.

Passive.name: Blessed Resurrection
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Revives with 35% HP upon falling in battle. [Once per Battle]
